de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la so so ci rigs par rim gro byas nas ngas de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa'ang ngas dran te/ nga lung bstan pa'i
dus dang tshod la'ang ma bab bo/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten du byung ste/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya ba sha stag ste/ nga de'i de'i dus na sbyin pa la dpa' bar gyur te/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gding ba dang / bgo ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba de lta bus
rim gro byas nas ngas de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa'ang ngas dran te/ nga lung bstan pa'i dus dang tshod la'ang ma bab bo/ /kun tu dpa' ba/
sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gsum 'jig rten du byung ste/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sha stag ste/
ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la gding ba dang / bgo ba dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / dgab pa dang / rgyan
rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bla ma dang rim gro bya ba de lta bu'i bla ma dang / rim gro bya bas rim gro byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag gis kyang don dang 'dul ba rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi sgo sna tshogs bshad nas ngas de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa'ang ngas dran te/
de na'ang lung bstan pa'i dus la ma bab bo/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar rgyal zhes bya ba bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga

'jig rten du byung ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/ da ltar nga la kun dga' bo rim gro byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

la rim gro byas nas ngas der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa ngas dran te/ de na'ang lung bstan pa'i dus la ma bab bo/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten du byung ste/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gding ba dang / bgo ba dang / spos
dang / phreng ba dang / byug pas bsnyen bkur byas nas/ ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la rim gro bya ba de lta bus ngas rim go byas te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu byung bar gyur
nas de nyid du nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos pa'ang ngas dran te/ ring po ma lon par rnam par gzigs tha ma gang byung ba des zung gi mdo'i chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / ngas de shes nas de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling du rin po che sna bdun gyi char rab tu phab ste/ de na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dbul ba med par gyur nas/ ngas
de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par gyur te/ de nas yun ring mo zhig lon gyi bar du'ang nga lung ma bstan to/ /gsol pa/ dus de gang lags/
tshod de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' ba/ nyon cig /de nas bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na gdod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'jig rten du byung ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'jig
rten du byung ba de na nga'ang bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyis tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthong nas me tog ut+pa la bdun gyis gtor te bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan te/ kun tu dpa' ba/ de nas nga shing ta la bcu gnyis srid kyi steng gi nam mkha'
bar snang la 'dug nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ gang ngas bskal pa grangs med pa rnams su tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang / gang pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
de thams cad kha sang dang / de ring cam du mngon sum du dran nas kun tu dba' ba/ de na'ang ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag dge ba'i chos rnams la so sor
bkod par gyur na/ kun tu dpa' ba/ nga da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa lta ci smos te/ kun
tu dpa' ba/ ngas sems can rnams la chos rnam pa mang po bstan to/ /ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ lha'i 'jig rten du ni/ lha'i gzugs
kyis chos bstan to/ /klu'i gnas su ni/ klu'i gzugs kyis chos bstan to/ /gnod sbyin gyi gnas su ni/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos bstan to/ /yi dwags kyi gnas su ni/ yi dwags
kyi gzugs kyis chos bstan to/ /mi'i 'jig rten du ni/ mi'i gzugs kyis chos bstan to/ /sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos
bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos bstan to/ /gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur
ba de dang de'i gzugs kyis ngas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ kun tu dpa' pa/ de ltar sems can rnams la rnam pa mang bos chos bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun tu
dpa' ba/ sems can rnams ji ltar chos rnam pa mang po thos pa de ltar sems can snying po de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po dag byed par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa rnams sbyin par 'gyur/
bsod nams dag byed par 'gyur/ bdag gi don du mi nyal ba'ang byed par 'gyur/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa'ang sgom par 'gyur te/ de dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i las
mngon par 'du bya ba rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag chos thos pa'i rgyus sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dran par gyur te/ de lha dang mi de dag gis yun ring bo'i don dang / phan pa dang bde
bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ de ltar na/ zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos ma thag tu yon tan dang phan yon de ltar dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can de dag
gcig la gcig 'di skad 'dzer to/ /gang byas shing bsags pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams cad la
phan bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa lta/ de dag gis smras pa/ gang dag chos la yid ches nas 'di skad ces yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin gyi chos yod do/ /zhes zer ba de dag gi bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po ni/ chos kyi bde ba bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gti mug blun po gang dag 'di
skad ces chos rnams kyang med do/ /chos rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'ang med do/ /zhes zer ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po de ni/ ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur
ro| |de dag ni/ phyi phyir zhing ngan song gi sa la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgyad kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bcu gnyis
kyi bar du yi dwags kyi yul rnams su sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bcu drug gi bar du lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa dgu stong gi bar
du 'byung po dang / sha za rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khri bzhi stong gi bar du lce med par 'gyur ro/ /bskal ba khri drug stong gi bar du ma'i mngal du 'chi ba'i dus byed par
'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khri nyid stong gi bar du sha ril ril por 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khri chig stong gi bar du dmus long du skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de na pha ma
dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag ni/ don med par sdug bsngal myong ngo / /bdag cag gi bu skyes pa ni/ don med do/ /zla ba dgu'i bar du don med par mngal du btsas

so| |grang ba dang dro ba'i tshor ba myong ngo / /bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal kyang rab tu myong ngo / /tshe 'di la'ang sdug bsngal mang po myong ngo / /pha mas khyim du bu skyes pa mthong na'ang brod|
med cing pa ma rab tu re thag chad par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gror gzhol ba yin te/ de
dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mya ngan gyi zug rdu chen pos zug par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ gang dag tshig 'di skad ces chos rnams yod do/ /chos rnams kyi pha
rol tu 'gro ba yod do/ /zhes zer ba de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa nyi shu'i bar du byang gi sgra mi snyan du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du sum cu rtsa gsum
gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum nas shi 'phos nas byang gi sgra mi snyan du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig
rten gyi khams brgya stong dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang bde ba can zhes bya ba sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de nyid du
gnas te/ de nyid du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ de ltar na zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ mthu che ba'o/ /gang dag 'di la
sems dad pa de dag nam du'ang yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu dpa' ba/ la la
dag de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan du sems can mang po zhig yongs su thar par byas nas kyang da dung du sems can gyi khams zad par ma gyur te/ mang po zhig ni/ byang chub tu
smon lam 'debs/ mang po zhig ni/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes/ mang po zhig ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par gyur na/ rgyu gang gis sems can zad par ma gyur ces 'dzer ba'i
sems can dag kyang yod do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma dang 'gyed du 'dod ngo snyam mo/ /de

nas bram ze dang / gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gcer bu pa brgya phrag du ma zhig rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der dod ngo / /yang de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom
ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
nas /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de |bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu| nyon cig /deng rgyal po'i khab 'dir 'dus pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dir lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ mi'am/ mi ma lags pa'am/ su dag 'chi
bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ deng 'dir lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad 'ong
par 'gyur te/ bram ze brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag dgu stong 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dang
ngar 'gyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad kyi 'gyed pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya ste/ bram ze de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa bye ba stong phrag dgu po de dag thams cad ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i
rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de dag nga las chos thos par 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
skyed par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba stong phrag drug cu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud sdig can g.yog dang bcas pa bye ba stong phrag sum cu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha ma
yin gyi rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis 'ongs bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po lnga brgya tsam yang 'khor dang bcas nas chos nyan du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga las chos thos
nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan
las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis ming ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' ba/ nyon cig /rgyal
po dga' bo zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po nye dga' zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ces bya ba dang / rgyal po tshangs pa'i sde zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya
ba dang | rgyal po blta na mdzes zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po mdza' ba'i sde zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po dga' ba'i sde zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po
gsal rgyal zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rgyal po lnga brgya tsam dang / rgyal po re re zhing yang g.yog bya ba brgya stong yod de/ rgyal po
'phags skyes po ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go /shar phyogs
nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag sum cu 'ong ngo / /lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag lnga bcu 'ong ngo / /nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
stong phrag drug cu 'ong ngo / /byang phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'ong ngo / /'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu 'ong
do/ /steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgya 'ong ste/ thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
cad bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la bka' stsal pa/ kun
tu dpa' ba/ khyod phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la deng de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
chos ston gyi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas pa khyed thams cad thal mo sbyar te thud cig /ces de skad smros la go bar byas ma thag tu yud tsam gyis chos nyan du slar shog cig /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas| bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas te| rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su song nas byang chub
sems dpa' rnams la deng de bzhin gshegs la rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por chos ston gyi/ de la khyed cag gis legs so/ /zhes bya ba gsol cig dang / de'i phyir khyed deng nyid
du phan pa dang bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsge'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su song nas
sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la spyon pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas se gol gtog pa tsam gyis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de
nas bram ze rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyang 'dus/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi mang po
zhig dang / rgyal po g.yog dang bcas pa lnga brgya tsam yang 'dus/ bdud sdig can g.yog dang bcas pa bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsum yang 'dus so/ /yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi
grong khyer chen po rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char rab tu bab/ lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab nas de bcom
ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su khang pa brtsegs par kun tu gnas so/ /yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rdo rje gsor ba dang
de nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi rgyal po bzhi 'khrugs te/ langs nas gang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i nyal nyil dang / phyag dar dang / bye ma de rnams grong khyer gyi
phyi rol tu bor nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su spos chu'i char rab tu bab/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu
ta dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char yang rab tu bab nas me tog de dag thams cad kyang sems can de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng du me tog gi gdugs su gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu gnas te/ khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong po rnams kyi nad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khri brgyad khri
bzhi stong byung ste/ khri de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas chos ston to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos
so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dba' ba bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi tsa ya
can rgod deb bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la gnas pa dbul por gyur pa la la zhig yod la de'i mgo la rgyal pos byugs pa dang / de rgyal po'i sgo'i bar du song ste/ phyin nas
nan gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i blon po dang / 'khor gyis de bzung nas rnam pa mang pos brdegs pa dang / de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul po
de nan gyis nang du 'gro 'dod do/ /zhes rgyal pos thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gdon mi za ba rang la gsod 'dod pa zhig yin no/ /snyam nas rgyal po khros te 'khor rnams la 'di skad
ces khyed deng la mi de ri khrod du khrid de sod cig /g.yog dang / pha ma dang / bu dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa thams cad kyang sod cig /ces bsgo ba dang /
de nas de dag thams cad bsad nas de'i gnyen bshes thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngu mi bzad pas zug par gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa dang / de na mi nga rgyal can ji lta ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs
dang | mtshan mar bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus yin pa snyam du sems shing / de na de dag chos mang po thos nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal du lhung ste/ kyal pa sna tshogs smra ba dang /
bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'i zil gyis non nas bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i chos mi nyan mi 'chad de/ gang la la zhig mdo'am/ tshigs su bcad pa'am/ tha na dpe tsam
zhig de dag la bshad na'ang de bdag gis shes so/ /zhes de dag la mi 'dzin cing rna bas kyang mi nyan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga rgyal can du gyur pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni/ mang du
thos pas bag med pa'o/ /gang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang 'grogs pa de dag gi/ 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa byed par mi 'gyur/ de dag ni// 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig
thos par mi 'gyur gyi/ de dag ni/ mang du thos pa des rgyags par 'gyur te/ mi de lta bu de dag ni/ rang gi rang bzor byas pa 'jog par byed/ rang gi gzhung gi gleng bzhi'ang 'jog par byed
do| |de dag ni/ bdag dang 'jig rten thams cad la slu zhing don med par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms mang po za ste/ zos nas kyang legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi
tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis de la smras pa/ khyod kyis ni/ nga la bzo'i gnas mang du bslab na/ ji ltar khyod bdag 'jog par mi nus/ des de dag la
'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /nga ni/ da ltar bdag 'jog par mi nus so/ /de na sems can de dag smre sngags rnam pa sna tshogs 'don par 'gyur te/ ji ltar gzhan gyis ma
lan gyi| rang gi las kyi rkyen gyis gang zag de gcig pu'i phyir gnyen gyi tshogs mang po bsad par gyur pa de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smre sngags 'don
cing mi dge ba'i grogs pa'i phyir bdag cag sems can dmyal ba'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin du khyed rnams la bram ze dang / gzhan mu stegs can
rnams kyis smras pa/ khyed cag rgyags par ma gyur cig /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya 'dab gshog ma rdzogs par lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phur mi nus pa
de bzhin du khyed rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mi nus te/ khyed cag la de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las kyi rnam pas bya gag
gi skye gnas su skyes nas lus 'di ring po mi thogs par lus 'jig cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag ro bro ba med nas bdag cag gis lus 'di ci zhig gi phyir
bzung / bdag cag gis gang lha'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba'ang ma myong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas la'ang gnas par ma gyur te/ bdag cag gis lus
'di ni| don med par bzung na/ bdag cag gi 'gro ba ni/ gang yin/ bdag cag gi rten du ni/ su zhig 'gyur/ gang du skye zhing gang du 'jig par 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas yongs su skrag
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag rin po che'i dzam+bu'i gling 'dir yi
chad par ma byed cig /khyed chos dkon mchog las phyi rol tu ma gyur cig /kye grogs po dag /khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyed kyi bsam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas bram ze dang / gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa de dag thams cad stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu bgos te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas gdugs mtshan du sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su bkrol yang sems
can gyi khams la bri ba'am/ gang bar yang mi gda' na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis sems can de dag skye ba dang / 'gag pa mnyam par ston/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ mu stegs can dag 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang / chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir go cha
chen po bgos nas 'dri ba'i gleng gzhi chen po 'dri ste/ phyi ma'i dus na sems can gzhon nu dang / rgan po rnams skye ba dang 'jig pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ sems can rgan po dag kyang
gzhon nu bzhin du ci'ang mi shes pa'ang yod do/ /sman gyi sde/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig skra bkrus nas gos gsar pa bgos te/ de khyim gyi phyi rol tu byung ba de la sems can rnams
kyis khyod gos gsar pa legs bar bgos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / sems can gzhan zhig kyang mgo bkrus nas gos rnying pa'ang bkrus te bgos pa dang / de zegs pas mi de skra bkrus kyang mdzes
par ma gyur la/ de'i gos kyang mdzes par ma gyur pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ dzam+bu'i gling na sems can rgan po yod pa dag ni/ mdzes pa ma yin te/ sems can gzhon nu dag ni/ skye ba dang /
'gag pa ston to/ /de nas bram ze dang / gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu de dag thams cad stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi nang na gzhon nu ni/ gang lags/ rgan po ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag ni/ yang dang yang
sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro ba dang / yi dwags rnams su tshor ba myong yang khyed da dung du ngom mi myong bas khyed cag ni/ rgan pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze de dag
thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slan chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la mi spro'o/ /gang gzhan mu stegs can
dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /sems can gzhon nu rnams las kyang gang chos nyid mngon sum du byed nus pa med do/ /de skad ces
smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du sems can rnams mos pa
dka' ba la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig dang de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon sum du mdzad do/ /de
nas sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing phyag
kyang mi 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'ang mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /sems can gzhon nu rnams
kyis chos nyid mngon sum du byed mi nus so/ /zhes sems can gang de skad zer ba la/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag ni/ khyed kyis sems can gzhon nu yin par blta'o/ /sems can de dag gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ sems can gzhon nu lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag cag ni/ sems can gzhon nu lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye sems can 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten mngon sum du byed pa yin gyi/ da rang gi lus las 'jig rten gyi tshad ston cig /de'i tshe de'i dus na
sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi lus dang ma bral bar steng gi nam mkha' la gnas te/ sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang dag 'khor ba yongs su zad par bgyi ba dang / yongs su byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson
'grus rtsom pa'i sems can de lta bu ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can 'di dag ni/ deng nyid skyes la/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can 'di dag ni/ deng
nyid yongs su grol te thams cad kyang sa bcu rab tu thob par mthong ngo / /bam po gsum pa/ de nas bram ze dang / gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa
dang | klu'i rgyal po dang / bdud sdig can 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad lhags nas g.yo bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du mchis te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig /'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag /de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyed de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gan du lhags nas khyed kyis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /des na khyed thams cad ring po
mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas gzhan mu
stegs can de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
thams cad steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la shing ta la bdun srid du mngon par 'phags nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul zhing thams
cad kyang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs byin gyis rlob ste rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug gi steng logs su gnas te/
bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma sna tshogs 'thor zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yid la byed de/ rang gi lus la'ang sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed do/ /lha'i bu bye ba
brgya stong phrag du ma'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad du dge sbyong gau ta ma ni/ rnyed pa chen po'o/ /zhing chen po'o/ /'jig rten gyi mgon no/ /ting nge 'dzin
gyi stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa'o/ /mkhas pa mkhas pa tshol ba lags te/ gang sems can 'di lta bu dag thabs mkhas pas mthar gyis 'khor ba las yongs su thar par mdzad de legs
par gsungs pa gcig tsam gyis kyang sems can de snyed cig 'khor ba las yongs su grol lo/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas| bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud de| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis rigs kyi bu de dag tshig 'di skad 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bgyi
ba mang po bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa mang po mngon par 'du bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nyon cig /de dag ni/ nga la bstod pa
ma yin gyi/ rang gi lus la bstod cing rang gi lus chos kyi stan dam pa la 'jog par 'gyur/ rang gi lus las chos kyi 'od zer 'byin par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos
ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bde bar gshegs pa
gdugs mtshan du sems can mang po zhig yongs su grol yang da dung du sems can rnams zad par ma gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod gang de bzhin
gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sman gyi sde/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig phyug cing nor che la longs spyod che ste/ nor dang / 'bru dang /

mdzod dang / bang ba mang po dang ldan la/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi mang po dang ldan te/ de nor gyi phung po mang la zhing dang kun dga'i ra ba mang du bdog
cing / 'di lta ste/ nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / bal sran dang / sran chung la sogs pa 'bru mang du bdog pa zhig yod la/ mi des dpyid kyi dus la 'bru thams cad kyi sa bon btab nas dus
gzhan zhig gi tshe sa bon de dag thams cad yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / mi des 'bru de dang de dag so sor 'jog ste/ bzhag nas kyang dpyid kyi dus kyi bar du zos nas yang 'debs pa
bzhin du sman gyi sde/ sems can rnams kyang sngon las byas pa'i las de dag thams cad yongs su zad par gyur pa dang / de la bsod nams kyi zhing tshol te dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do/ /
bskyed nas kyang dge ba'i chos de la nan tan gyis sgrub ste chos thams cad 'phel bar byas nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba bskyed de/ sman gyi sde/ dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems des bskal pa
bye ba'i bar du chud mi za'o/ /sman gyi sde/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud za ba'i chos can du nam yang mi 'gyur te/
mdor na chos thams cad rab tu shes so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas rmi lam ji lta bu mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du 'jigs pa mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las thams cad yongs
su sbyong ba'i phyir ro/ /sems can sdig pa'i las can gyis ni/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sel bar mi nus so/ /de ni/ sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong yang 'jigs pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du ji ltar 'jigs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/
me rab tu 'bar ba mthong ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' des bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad tshig par rig par bya'o/ /sman gyi sde/ gnyis su na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dang po bskyed pa des chu brug cing rab tu brug pa mthong yang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi sde/ de bzhin du gti mug gis bcings pa thams cad las ldog nas sdig pa
byang bar byas pa yin no/ /sman gyi sde/ gsum du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam na 'jigs pa chen po mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi lus kyi mgo bregs pa mthong yang sman gyi sde/ de la des 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
dang | gti mug bregs pa yin te/ bdag ni/ 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba las rgyal ba yin no/ /snyam mo/ /de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa'ang ma yin/ dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams
kyi nang du ma yin/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du ma yin/ klu rnams kyi nang du ma yin/ lha rnams kyi nang du ma yin te/ sman gyi sde/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye ba rab tu 'dzin to/ /sman gyi sde/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na gal te sems can la la zhig byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur na/ des
yi dam chen po bcas par blta ste/ brnyas par gnas par gyur kyang sman gyi sde/ de la ngas skyo ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya/ zhum par mi bya'o/ /sman gyi sde/ ngas chos mang du bstan te/
sman gyi sde/ ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zhig gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa spyad kyang sman gyi sde/ ngas longs spyod kyi phyir ram/ 'tsho ba'i longs spyod kyi phyir ram/ dbang
phyug gi longs spyod kyi phyir dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa ma yin gyi/ sman gyi sde/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ngas dka' ba spyod pa spyad kyang ngas
de srid kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi/ sman gyi sde/ gang gi tshe gang gi dus na gnas zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de nyid kyi nyin
mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sman gyi sde/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab bo/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa rnyed par dka'o//
sman gyi sde/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba'ang mchog tu rnyed par dka'o/ /sman gyi sde/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dag kyang mchog tu rnyed par dka'o/ /gang dag chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ bskal pa stong du 'khor
ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /'gog pa dang lam yang rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/ /gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod
par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa dang dge ba'i gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i gnas
dang 'gog pa rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ ci'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi gnas ni/ don zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ chos kyi gnas gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos zhes bgyi ba ni/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa nyid dang /
tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags te/ chos kyi gter zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ chos kyi gter 'byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang dag mang du thos pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu shes pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba bde ba'i gnas 'di rab tu shes so/ /nam de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba de na
sems can rnams kyis chos rab tu shes so/ /thabs mkhas pas chos rnams rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten dang
'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnams rab tu shes so/ /gsol pa/ ye shes nyid rtogs nas mya ngan las 'das pa gang rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ chos rab tu shes nas chos rnams rab tu shes so/ /sman gyi sde/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos bsdu ba rab tu shes nas rnyed pa dang po skye'o/ /chos ji
ltar thos pa bzhin du bzung nas chos dang ldan pa nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi tshong bar gyur pa la la zhig mi khur stong gi gser khyer te de khe spogs
kyi phyir song ba dang / de'i pha ma 'di skad smra ste/ bu/ nyon cig /gser srang stong khyer la gzhan dang rang gi gser legs par khyer cig /tshong pa des gser khyer te song nas zla ba gcig
tsam lon pa dang gser de dag thams cad chud gsan te med par byas kyi 'og tu de nas mi des bsam pa dang / shin tu mi dga' nas snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste/ de gnod zhing
ngo tsha nas rang gi khyim du ma song ba dang / de'i pha mas thos nas yi chad de/ snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gos dag kyang dral te bu ngan pa de bdag cag gi khyim du bu'i gzugs su
skyes nas khyim sa kun kyang bshig ste/ bdag cag la mkho ba med cing sdug bsngal bar byas so/ /bran gyi las byed du bcug go /zhes de skad smre sngags 'don te/ de'i pha ma yi chad
nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de nas bu des pha ma bdag la yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /zhes thos nas bu de'ang yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ de bzhin

gshegs pas don 'di bshad pa la'ang gang dag nga'i bstan pa la mi dad pa de dag ni/ re thag chad nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /ji

ltar pha ma de dag yi chad de gser gyi phyir mya ngan byed cing / snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gzhan dang rang gi gser gyi phyir mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ gang dag
nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag ni/ phyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung zhing smre sngags 'don la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing / sngon las byas pa'i bsod nams dag chud zos nas phyin chad
zhing bzang po dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dag mi byed de/ de dag gi snying mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pas de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye ngas dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten dud skye zhing / mi bzad pa drag po mthong nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ gang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mthong
bar mi 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de myong bar mi 'gyur bar bdag la su zhig skyabs su 'gyur snyam pa dang / de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu gcig nad kyi 'jigs chen ni/ /
'byung bar mi nus ji ltar bya/ /na ba 'chi bas 'jigs mod kyi/ /bu khyod 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /nad kyis 'jigs dang skrag pa las/ /khyod ni thar par 'gyur
ba yin| |bdag ni rnam par shes pa 'gag /bdag gi lus la rab tu gnod/ /yan lag thams cad sdug bsngal te/ /bdag gis 'chi ba mthong bar gyur/ /bdag gis mig ni mi mthong
zhing | |bdag gi rna ba'ang mi thos so/ /sna yang thob par mi 'gyur te/ /lus kyang zo mdog bde ma yin/ /yan lag nying lag sdug bsngal te/ /shing dang 'dra bas sems pa med/ /bdag
gi 'chi ba 'od med ces/ /yum gyis bdag gi spro bsring zad/ /mas smras pa/ bu khyod de skad smra mi rigs/ /nga la mchog tu 'jigs ma byed/ /khyod kyi lus la rims btab pas//
rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur/ /bus smras pa/ lus la rims kyang ma mthong ste/ /na ba med cing sdug bsngal med/ /'chi ba shin tu mi bzad mthong / /bdag gi lus sdug
bcom par gyur/ /bdag gi lus kun sdug bsngal gyis/ /rab tu gzir bar mthong gyur na/ /su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/ /bdag gi skyob par su zhig 'gyur/ /pha mas smras pa bu
khyod la| |lha yang rab tu bkyon gyur gyi/ /lha rnams la ni mchod byas na/ /de yi 'og tu 'tsho bar gyur/ /bus smras pa/ gang gis bdag ni 'tsho 'gyur ba/ /khyod kyis de ltar mdzad
du gsol/ /rings shing rab tu myur bzhud la/ /lha bon po la dri bar gsol/ /de nas de'i pha ma lha'i rten gyi drung du song nas lha la bdug pa phul ba dang / de nas lha bon pos lha la
bdug pa phul nas /tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod la lha bkyon gyi/ lha rjed cig /mchod sbyin gyis shig /de la phyugs sod cig /mi yang sod cig dang / de nas khyed kyi bu nad las
yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de nas pha ma de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag ni/ dbul na ji ltar bya/ gal te lha ma mnyes na ni/ bu de'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur /ci ste mnyes
bar bya na/ bdag cag ni| dbul bas mi dang phyugs gang nas blang snyam nas de dag rings shing myur bar khyim du dong ste/ khyim gyi rdzas cung zad ci bdog pa de thams cad phyugs nyo
ba'i phyir 'tshong du dong ngo / /de nas mi gzhan zhig gi gan du phyin nas/ kye skyes bu/ gser zhig bskyir byin/ skyin pa ni/ zhag bcu nas slar 'bul nus na ni/ legs/ ci ste 'bul ma
nus na'ang nged khyed kyi bran du khas blangs te las bya'o/ /zhes de skad smras nas de gnyis kyis gser de khyer te mi nyor dong ngo / /de gnyis kyis mi nyos nas mi des kyang bdag gsad par
ni| ma shes so/ /de nas pha ma rmongs par gyur pa de gnyis slar rang gi khyim du ma dong gi /lha rten gyi drung du song ste/ lha bon po la da myur du mchod sbyin mdzod cig ces smras so/ /de nas
pha ma de gnyis bdag nyid kyis phyugs kyang bsad/ mi de'ang bsad do/ /de nas lha bon po des mchod sbyin bya bar bsam ste me bus pa dang / de nas lha de babs
te khyod kyi bu ni/ ngas khyer ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma de gnyis dga' zhing mgu bas khyab nas bu 'di sos na bdag cag bran du gyur kyang bla zhes smras te/ pha mas lha la
mchod sbyin byas nas slar log ste rang gi khyim du phyin nas bu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa mthong ngo / /de nas pha ma de gnyis sdug bsngal zhing yi mug pa chen pos snying la mya ngan gyi zug
rdu zug ste yi chad par gyur nas de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ mi dge ba'i grogs po dang bsten par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems
can de dag gang du skye ba zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ kha rog /nga la ma 'dri zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zhu'o/ /bde bar gshegs
pa| zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de la ma ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod du skyes so/ /pha ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus
gzhom du skyes so/ /bu ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skyes so/ /lha bon pho ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
mi ma nongs pa de gang du skyes/ de'i tshe slad ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ 'di la mi ma nyes pa de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang
du skyes so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis mi de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /mi de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes lan gcig smras te/ sman gyi sde/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
des bskal pa drug cu'i bar du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ skye ba dang skye bar mya ngan
gyi zug rdu thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes ma thag tu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed do/ /sems can de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ni/ mi
nus so| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rdo thogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi
sde| brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /
brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni/ 'bras bu rnams ston pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /lan gcig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / dgra
bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus
kyi gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang / byang chub kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas te/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas zhes bya'o//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
mi la la zhig gis shing zhig bskyed na/ de nyid kyi nyin mo shing de'i rtsa ba zug nas de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba de'i dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu song ngo / /mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de bzhin
du shing bskyed pa dang / de nyid kyi nyin mo rlung gis bskyod de shing de rtsa ba ma zug nas/ de nas mi des shing de phyung ba dang / mi gcig shos kyis kyang ci'i phyir nga'i sa brkos zhes
'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur nas/ de'i tshe rgyal pos mi gnyis 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur to/ /zhes thos nas rgyal po des pho nya btang ste/ song la mi de gnyis khrid de shog cig /lha/ de ltar
'tshal lo/ /zhes mi de rings pa'i gzugs su brgyugs nas mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces khyed la rgyal po 'bod do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de nas mi gcig ni/ 'jigs shing skrag go /mi
gcig ni/ 'jigs shing skrag pa med par rgyal po ga la ba der khrid do/ /khrid nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal pos mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ khyed ci zhig
gi phyir 'thab cing rtsod par gyur/ de nas mi de gnyis langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ /gsan du gsol/ bdag cag la ni/ sa phyogs cung zad kyang ma mchis
kyi| g.yar po zhig la shing bskyed pa las rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa ba'ang ma zug /lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang ma byung ste/ rgyal po chen po/ /de'i rtsa ba dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu'ang
ma mchis pa dang / khyod kyis nyes so/ /zhes mi 'dis bdag la thab mo brgal du bas kyi/ bdag gis ma nongs na/ lha/ de la bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs par mkhyen par mdzad du
gsol| de nas rgyal po des blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bkug ste bsags nas 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /khyed cag smros shig /blon po rnams kyis gsol ba/ ji skad smra bar bgyi/ gang gi
nyin mo shing bskyed pa de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba zug nas lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu 'byung ba de khyed kyis gang na'ang mthong ngam/ thos sam/ khyed kyis
zhag bdun nam/ zla phyed kyis 'di bye brag phyed par gyis shig /de nas blon po de dag stan las langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag cag gis
'di bye brag phyed par bgyir mi rung ngo / /'di bye brag phyed par rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di ni/ ngo mtshar te/ re zhig mi 'di nyid la smras bar bgyi'o/ /kye skyes bu/ gang smras
pa'i don bden nam smros shig /smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ don de mad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa/ /de yi nyin mo rtsa zug cing / /'dab ma me tog 'bras
byung zhes/ /de nyid nyin mo smras ba ni/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di 'thad par dka'/ /'di 'dra mthong ba'am thos pa med/ /de nas mi des thal sbyar te/ /rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /gshegs
la nyid kyis shing bskyed de/ /rtsa ba zug la gzigs su gsol/ /de nas rgyal po de blon po bye ba phrag sum cu dang lhan cig phyi rol tu byung nas mi de gnyis kyang btson rar bcug
go /de nas rgyal po de nyid kyis shing bskyed pa dang / shing de rtsa ba'ang ma zug /lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang ma byung nas de nas rgyal po de khros te 'di skad ces khyed myur
du deng la shing gsheg ba'i sta re rnams longs shig /ces smras nas blangs pa dang / de nas gang mi des bskyed pa'i shing de la khros nas shing de'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
bu byung ba rnams bcad de shing gcig po de bcad pa dang shing bcu gnyis byung ngo / /shing bcu gnyis po bcad pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtsa ba dang bcas/ lo ma dang bcas/
myu gu dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo / /de nas shing nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag las bya gser gyi ze ba can/ gser gyi mchu can/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma can nyi shu rtsa bzhi
byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po de khro bas zil gyis non nas rang gi lag gis sta re blangs te shing de la gtsabs pa dang / shing gtsabs pa de las bdud rtsi'i chu byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po
de yid mi bde nas song la mi de gnyis brtson ra nas phyung zhig ces bsgo ba dang / lha/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes de'i mod la rab tu brgyugs te/ mi de gnyis brtson ra nas phyung nas
shing ga la ba der khrid pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shing gcig bcang ba nyis 'gyur tu 'phel te nyi shu rtsa bzhir gyur pa de khyed kyis bskyed dam/ ngas bskyed pa'i shing ni/ rtsa ba
dang | lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang ma skyes so/ /de nas mi des gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag gi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i bsod nams khyod la mi
mnga'o| |de nas blon po bye ba phrag sum cus pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs nas mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po snga ma 'di ni/ mi rung gi /khyod kyis
rgyal po bya dgos so/ /de nas mi des blon po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal po longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang dgos pa med/ /sangs rgyas
rnams la bdag dad pas/ /rkang gnyis dag gi mchog tu shog /zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings/ /gang na de bzhin gshegs par 'gro /mya ngan 'das khyim 'gro 'gyur ba/ /
chos 'di khyed la bshad par bya/ /skyil mo krung ni bcas nas su/ /de nas yi dam rab bcas so/ /bdag gis sngon byas las rnams kyis/ /rgyal po'i btson rar phyin par
gyur| |smon lam 'di ni btab pas na/ /bdag gi las ni zad par gyur/ /de nas bya bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rdo rje'i mchus sil snyan rnams dkrol to/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus
na khang pa brtsegs pa sum khri nyis stong byung ste/ khang pha brtsegs pa re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga bar gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re re las kyang bya gser gyi ze
bcan| gser gyi mchu can/ gser gyi gdong can bye ba phrag nyi shu lnga lnga byung ste de dag gis mi'i skad du smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis legs ma byas/ /khyod kyis shing de
bcad pas na/ /bye ba brgya yi shing rnams las/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas par gyur/ /sems can gang gis shing bskyed 'di/ /ci 'dra shes pa ma yin pa/ /sdig pa'i las kyis phyin chad kyang //
mi sdug 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis don 'di mi shes kyi/ /dka' thub chen po lung ston cig /bya rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten snang byed de/ /rnam
par 'dren par 'gyur ba yin/ /'khor ba'i srid ba'i brtson ra las/ /sems can thams cad thar byed pa'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis shing ni ma skyes pa/ /skyes bu gnyis pa de gang
yin| |des ni sdig pa'i las gang byas/ /gnyis skyes rnams ni smra bar byos/ /bya rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi shing ni ma skyes pa/ /de ni lha sbyin glen pa ste/ /dge ba cung zad ma byas na/ /de yi
shing ni ji ltar skyes/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bo rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas te mngon par shes pa so sor
thob bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de'ang sa bcu la gnas nas dge ba'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis blon po bye ba phrag sum tu rtsa gsum bo rnams sa bu la gnas te mngon bar shes pa so sor thob par gyur/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig dang lung bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le
brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das
la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'jum pa
mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skye bo'i tshogs nga'i gan du
'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de'i phyir skye bo'i tshogs la rnam par rtogs te ltos shig /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes rnam par bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas/ de'i phyogs gcig na skye bo'i tshogs
bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ mi dag mi smra/ mi zer/ mi brjod/ mi za/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / lho phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa
zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa
dang | nub phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/
mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / byang phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag
kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra| yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / 'og gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas de
la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra
bar 'khod pa dang / steng gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu
mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes
'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten nas
skye bo'i tshogs mang po lhags shing gnas pa nas 'og dang steng phyogs kyi bar nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag lnga bcu lhags shing gnas par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod song la 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la khyod nyid kyis zhus
shig |gsol pa/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mchi bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas song zhig /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba can gyi zhing zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
bye ba stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
sde bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing de'i spyan sngar 'dug gnas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang gis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar skye bo'i tshogs
phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing lhags pa dag de na mchis pa'i tshe ni/ mthong la/ 'di na mchis pa'i tshe mi mthong bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de
nyid na rgyu zhing gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang ji lta bu lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi
zhing ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de dag tu sems can ji snyed mthong ba de snyed ni/ gang na'ang ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| sems can de dag ni/ sems pa med pa'i shing las byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems pa ma mchis pa'i shing las mi byung ba sus mthong / sus thos/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang sems pa med pa'i shing las mi 'byung ba khyod kyis ma mthong / ma thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
ma mthong / ma thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod mthong bar 'dod na/ de da ngas bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /bde bar
gshegs pa/ 'tshal lo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing nas phyag brkyangs pa dang / phyag de las skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya byung ste/ skye bo'i tshogs re res
kyang lag pa brgya brgya brkyangs nas spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod kyis skye
bo'i tshogs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs byung ba 'di dag sems pa med pa'o/ /mi 'di dag ni/ sems pa med pa'o/ /de nas bye ba stong phrag brgya po de dag re
re zhing yang gang lag pa brgya brgya yod pa de dag thams cad lhung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ci zhig lags/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'di ci zhig lags/ gang mi rnams kyi lag pa brgya po'ang yud tsam gyis lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
gal te lag pa brgya ba'ang grol bar mi 'gyur na/ lag pa gnyis pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de
bzhin du sems can rnams ni/ sems pa med par skye'o/ /sems pa med par 'gag go /sman gyi sde/ de'i lus kyang sems pa med par gyur par shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ gang sems can de dag la gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can gzhon pa'ang yod/ rgan
pa'ang yod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag da ltar lhung ba de dag ni/ rgan
pa'o| |gang dag shing rnams las skyes pa de dag ni/ gzhon pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gzhon nu rnams mthong bar 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla
ba can gyi zhing gis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil brkyangs pa dang / de nas phyogs bcu nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya brgya 'ong ngo / /'og dang steng gi phyogs nas skye bo'i
tshogs bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'ong ste/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/
zhing cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du sems
can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing cang mi mchi bar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod mi shes sam/ sa phyogs ni/ sems/
pa med de/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing chos kyi phung po'ang mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi sde/ 'di la sems can gzhon nu kha cig ni/ mthong yang skye ba mi shes/ 'gag pa dang /
rga ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / mdza' ba dang bye ba dang / 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba
dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de dag thams cad mi shes te/ mthong yang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur na/ shes par lta ga la 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde/ de dag yang dang yang bslab par
bya'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos ma 'tshal ba'i sems can
gzhon nu de dag gang nas mchis/ gang nas 'chi 'pho zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /mi'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa de
dag ni| dngul mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ zangs mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ shing mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ rdza mkhan gyis kyang ma byas te/ rgyal po'i
'jigs pas kyang ma byas kyi/ gzhan du na skyes pa dang bud med 'dus pa dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa las byung ngo / /sems can de dag kyang yang dang yang bzo'i las rnams
slob pas de dag gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ der de dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa myong ngo / /sman gyi
sde| 'di nyid du gang sems can gzhon nu lhags pa mi ldang ba 'di dag ni/ 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde/ de'i phyir mi smra/ kun tu mi smra'o/ /
sman gyi sde/ de ltar na/ sems can gzhon nu de dag ni/ dge ba'ang mi shes/ skye ba'ang mi shes/ 'gag pa'ang mi shes te/ de dag mi lus kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag kyang
sman gyi sde/ sems can gzhon nu rnams zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gzhon nu rnams ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| sman gyi sde/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis me la shing gis reg par byas pa dang / shing de la mthar gyis me 'bar ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ thog ma mi'i
lus su skye'o/ /skyes nas gdong tshor ba myong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das| su zhig 'dir mngon par skye| skyes nas su zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| sman gyi sde/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal pos mi la la zhig bcings te khang pa mun pa mun nag
gi nang du btson rar bcug pa dang / mi de khang pa mun nag der zhugs nas khang pa mun nag la khang pa mun nag tu mthong ngo / /de nas mi gzhan sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg pa zhig gis mthong
nas mi de ni/ ma rungs par gyur to/ /sngon sdug bsngal ma myong bas 'tsho ba srog chad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam bsam nas des der ma khyer te 'ongs nas khyim de'i nang du me cung zad cig bor ba
dang | mi btson rar bcug pa des me de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dbugs phyin par gyur te spro ba skyes so/ /me de'ang rgyu gang gis 'bar ba'i med 'bar ba des khyim de kun tu 'bar bar gyur
nas mi de'ang de nyid du tshig pa dang / de tshig go /zhes rgyal bos thos nas mi dga' ste/ de 'di snyam du phyin chad ni/ bdag gi yul du sems can gang yang brtson rar mi gzhug go /snyam du
sems so/ /de nas rgyal po des rang gi yul na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kye sems can khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ ma skrag cig /khyed cag 'jigs par ma gyur cig /phyin chad
nga'i yul du chad pas gcod pa'am/ brtson rar gzhug par mi bya'o/ /sems can gang yang srog dang dbral bar mi bya/ kye sems can khyed rnams ma 'jigs shig
ces de ltar dbugs phyung ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'o/ /ji ltar khyim tshig nas mi nyid
kyi lus kyang tshig ste/ sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas sems can bcings pa'ang bcings pa las yongs su thar par byed pa de bzhin du/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma spangs te/ sems can thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du 'jig rten du byung nas sems can rnams sems
can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin gyi lus rnams las yongs su thar par mdzad cing sems can gzhon nu dang / rgan po rnams kyang yongs su thar
par mdzad do/ /de nas steng gi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /rgyal ba'i zhing ni ngo mtshar zhing / /zhing bzang mngon par 'dus byas pa/ /de la sa bon btab pa ni/ /
rnam par chud zad mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba'i zhing ni dag pa'i zhing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsngags pa ste/ /sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir/ /ston pas kyang ni thabs mdzad do/ /
mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings gnas kyang / /sa yi steng na kun tu snang / /rtag tu 'jig rten zhi byas nas/ /sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams spyod/ /sems can gzhon nu thar par byed/ /
rgan po rnams kyang thar par byed/ /sems can thams cad khams gsum las/ /mthar gyis yongs su thar par byas/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad de/ /dud 'gro yi dwags thar par

byas| |'jig rten 'di yang zhi byas nas/ /'jig rten pha rol bde bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ bka' stsal pa/ legs pa rnams ni mthong na legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong
na legs/ /dam chos yon tan zhing yang legs/ /dge 'dun 'dus pa mthong na legs/ /zung bstan pa yang legs pa ste/ /sdig pa rnam par 'jig pa legs/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sems can gzhon nu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag thams cad ni/ deng nyid du sa bcu la rab tu gnas
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dpag tshad brgyad khri srid kyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / lha bye ba stong
phrag brgyad cu bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so/ /sems can gzhon nu de dag kyang thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes par snang la gnas bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras gang bar gyur pa dang / sems can
dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgra de nyan to/ /lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang sgra de la nyan to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi klu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'khrugs so/ /srin po bye ba stong phrag sum cu'ang dzam+bu'i gling 'dir lhags so/ /yi dwags dang /
gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'ang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun tu gnas so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba stong phrag brgya rang
rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so/ /bam po bzhi pa ste/ tha ma| de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus shing mchis pa mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ lha
dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa'ang mang ngo / /srin po bye ba phrag du ma zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te 'dus nas mchis par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mar shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng
nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes
bgyi ba| bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na/ chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni/ gang tshangs par spyod pa
yongs su tshol zhing gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad spong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gzhon nu mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas gdon mi za
bar gzungs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur zhing chos thams cad dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs gang gis
sems can mang po zhig 'dus shing chos kyi phung po nyan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang
dag skye ba nyid sdug bsngal du mi nyan/ rga shi nyid sdug bsngal du mi nyan/ nad nyid sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan sdug bsngal dang / smre sngags 'don pa sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang
bral ba sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal du mi nyan pa'i sems can yang phal cher yod de/ 'chi ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyir lus dang srog 'phrog pa yin te/
sman gyi sde/ 'di ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya'o/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed dang sems can
thams cad kyang 'chi'o/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyis non par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'chi
ba'i dus na rnam par shes pa tha ma la rnam par shes pa 'gag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrug par
byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rigs kyi bu/ rlung gsum po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la glong bar 'gyur/ 'khrul bar 'gyur/ 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur
ro| |de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na lus 'joms par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /mtshon zhes bya ba dang / skul ba zhes bya ba dang / zed pa zhes bya bas lus 'joms par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lus zhes bgyi
pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /kun tu 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/ tshig pa zhes kyang bya/ ngar snabs zhes kyang bya/ sgregs pa zhes kyang bya/ dur
khrod pa zhes kyang bya/ ngan pa'i blo zhes kyang bya/ khur lci ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas yongs su gzir ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas kun tu dkrugs pa zhes kyang bya/ srog yongs su gdung ba zhes
kyang bya| 'chi ba dang / sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/ grogs po dag /'di rnams ni/ lus zhes bya'o/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar 'gum/ ji
ltar 'tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'chi ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ bsod nams zhes bya ba
ni| 'tsho ba'o/ /grogs po dag /lus zhes bya ba ni/ 'chi ba ste/ rgyus pa bye bas ni/ dkris/ spu'i khung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ni/ ldan/ yan lag khri nyis stong gis ni/ sbrel/ rus
pa sum brgya drug cus ni/ brtan/ lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ gnas te/ srog chags de dag thams cad la'ang 'chi ba'ang yod/ 'chi ba 'gag pa'ang yod
do| |nam mi de 'chi ba de na srog chags de dag thams cad re thag chad par 'gyur te/ de na srog chags thams cad gcig la gcig za bas rlung 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/ de na
de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo / /la la ni/ bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni/ bu mo'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni/ gnyen gyi phyir mya ngan byed de/ de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi
zug rdus zug go /gcig la gcig za bar brtsams nas de dag gcig gis gcig zos te srog chags gnyis shig lus pa na de gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thabs te
zhag bdun 'das pa dang / srog chags gcig ni/ bcom mo/ /gcig ni/ thar to/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ chos zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar srog chags rnams
gcig la gcig mi mthun par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang gcig la gcig mi mthun pa byed de/ skye bas mi 'jigs/ rga
bas mi 'jigs/ nad kyis mi 'jigs/ 'chi bas mi 'jigs so/ /ji ltar srog chags gnyis 'thab pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab bo/ /de nas 'chi ba'i
dus na skyes bu dge ba rnams kyis smras pa/ skyes bu/ khyod ci zhig la yid rton/ ci khyod kyis nyes pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngam/ skye ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa
ma mthong ngam/ 'chi ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo / /rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo / /thams cad kyi tha ma ra 'chi
ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo / /smras pa/ ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bya ba ma byas/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyis kar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
ma byas| grogs po dag /gnyis su'ang dri'o/ /khyod ci'i phyir skye ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar pa'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so
sor brtag pa ma byas/ ji ltar khyed kyis sa la gaN+DI brdung ba'i sgra ma thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon bskrun cing spos sam/ phreng ba'am/ mar me sbyin pa byin
pa ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'bul ba dang / 'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa'ang ma mthong / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ 'khor bzhi'o/ /de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te bsnyad pa dang / lha/ cung zad kyang ma bgyis so/ /mi khyod kyis
ni| dzam+bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so/ /de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing / /
gaN+DI brdung ba thos gyur la/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i/ /chos bstan thos kyang ma byas so/ /de nas mi des slar smras pa/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang
song nas/ /'dod pas 'khrul ba'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/ /'dod pa dag kyang bsten pa dang / /bdag gis srog chags rnams kyang bsad/ /dge 'dun rnams
kyang chud gsan pas/ /mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong / /gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su/ /bdag gis mchod rten bshig pa byas/ /tshig ngan rnams kyang rab tu smras/ /bdag gi ma yang
gdung bar byas/ /bdag gis lus kyis gang byas pa/ /nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ /sems dmyal chen po du 'bod du/ /shin tu mi bzad skye ba mthong / /bsdus gzhom du'ang tshor ba
myong / /de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang / /mnar med chen po mi bzad par/ /tshor ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /pad+ma lta bur cher gas pa'i/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du/ /thig nag
btab pa 'jigs chen du/ /lan brgya bar du skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su/ /phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni yang dang yang / /'jigs
pa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te/ /phyis kyang mun par rab tu ltung / /spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du/ /spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams
kyis| |spu gri mdun du 'byung 'gyur te/ /bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas/ /de dag gis ni de lus gtubs/ /rlung 'khrugs chen po mi bzad pas/ /lus de thams cad 'jig par byed//
rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar/ /sems can kun gyis bdag mthong ngo / /khyim so bya phyir gzhan dag gi /
nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs/ /bdag gis bu pho bu mo dang / /de bzhin phu nu sring mo dang / /bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po dang / /bran dang las byed
rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin pa dang phyugs dang g.yog /dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang / /de bzhin rab phra gos rnams dang / /khyim byed bcug pas
'khrul pa ste/ /khyim yang shin tu bkra byas nas/ /skyes pa bud med lang long dang / /pi wang sil snyan 'khrol ba la/ /bdag yid ma dul dga' bar 'gyur/ /
spos chu dag gis lus bkrus kyang / /nga dung byas pa gzo ba med/ /lus khyod sems pa med pa ste/ /nga ni khyod kyi ched la 'khrul/ /phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang / /bdag la skyob
par 'gyur ba med/ /rlung 'khrug chen po mi bzad par/ /lus ni yongs su gdung ba na/ /ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te/ /lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /phreng ba sna tshogs bzang mdzes
pa| |rab tu mang po mgo la bcings/ /mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te/ /mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin/ /bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa/ /sdig pa rnams ni mig gi rgyu/ /
lag pa rdo rjes bcad pa ni/ /bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no/ /lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags/ /sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug /mgul du mu tig se mo do/ /rkang pa gnyis kyang
rab tu brgyan/ /de la dra ba byas pa dang / /de la gser yang gnas par byas/ /lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gser gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no/ /longs spyod chen pos rab rtses
nas| |yid kyang shin tu brtas par gyur/ /rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas/ /shin tu sred pas de bstan to/ /gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis/ /bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go /
spos chu bzang pos khrus byas te/ /spos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus/ /lha rdzas ga bur tsan+dan gyi/ /bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs/ /kha dog bzang po byas nas kyang / /gla rtsi ldan pas
rab tu bsgos/ /lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang / /sna ma tsam+pa ka la sogs/ /bskus nas phra mo ka shi ka /dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos/ /glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su/ /rta yi rgyab
tu mngon par zhon/ /bdag ni rgyal po yin snyam sems/ /skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug /glu gar shin tu bslab pa yi/ /slas rnams kyang ni rab tu shes/ /ri dwags rnams ni ma nyes par/ /
bdag gis mdas kyang ri dwags bsad/ /'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sdig byas shing / /bdag gis gzhan gyi sha zos pas/ /de phyir bdag gi sdug
bsngal 'di/ /mi zad 'ongs pa 'gyur ba yi/ /'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas/ /bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas/ /deng ni bdag la 'chi 'ong na/ /skyabs
byed pa ni su yang med/ /gnyen rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang / /nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod/ /ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing / /ci phyir ngu zhing smre sngags 'don/ /ci phyir skra rnams
rab 'jig cing / /ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed/ /ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing / /brang yang rab tu rdung bar byed/ /bdag gson tshe na sdig pa rnams/ /spang bar bya rigs khyed
ci mdud/ /bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang / /khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni/ /bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur/ /lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos/ 'chi ba'i
sbrul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mi ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta bu yi sman rnams bsnyen/ /bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i/ /sman de dgos pa ma
yin na| |nyon mongs sprul las thar byed pa/ /da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni/ /'chi khar bdag la sbyin par byos/ /sha ni nga la ma sbyin cig /lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni/ /gdon mi za
bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sdug bsngal spyin gyur pa/ /sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs/ /lus 'di shin tu gsos byas kyang / /byas pa ma rung byed par 'gyur/ /bu dang bu mo ci zhig
phyir| |nga la mig gis blta bar byed/ /na ba 'di las da skyobs shig /don med par ni ci phyir ngu / /bu dang bu mo khyed cag dag /da ni ma rung ma byed cig /khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir/ /
ngas ni gzhan gyi nor yang 'phrog /da ni 'chi dus bab pa na/ /re thag chad kyi ci zhig byed/ /skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs/ /'chi bas kyang ni yongs su gzir/ /tshor ba 'du shes 'du
byed dang / /reg pa shin tu tshor ba'o/ /sred pas byis pa rnams kyang 'khyams/ /mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob/ /ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni/ /der yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur/ /
bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas/ /skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su nyams/ /chos la yang ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /yang skye ba ni mi shes pas/ /nyon mongs sprul
gyis nyon mongs pa/ /ma rig pas ni byis pa rnams/ /gang na thar pa med par 'khyams/ /thar pa'i don ni mi shes nas/ /'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa
'khyams/ /yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /bcing ba sna tshogs ldan lus la/ /mes ni kun tu 'bar zhing tshig /gang na bde ba med pa der/ /lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'khyams/ /gang
las shin tu bde 'byung ba/ /bde ba de ni mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog /tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
tshangs dbyangs yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de ltar
