smre sngags 'don kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba su'ang med do/ /zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag kyang gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung / /sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur/ /skom du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur/ /lus rnams
la ni me mdag 'bab/ /tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du/ /sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du/ /de yi lus ni rab tu 'tshig /bde ba dag ni mi shes shing / /chos
kyang rnam par mi shes te/ /chos ma yin pas byis pa 'khyams/ /bde ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur/ /dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /shes rab ldan zhing dka' thub che/ /dge ba'i
bshes gnyen bsten pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la/ /sems can thams cad yongs
bzung ba/ /dge ba'i las kyi chos ston cig /byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du/ /tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs/ /sman sde de skad thos nas kyang / /mchog tu sgrub par 'gyur
bar bya| |rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang / /sgra bsgrags rnam par 'dren pa dang / /'jig rten gyi ni pha dang ma/ /de ni byang chub sems zhes bya/ /'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa//
dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag gus nyan pa/ /de dag bla med sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /
gang dag gus dang bcas gyur pa/ /de dag kyang ni sems can kun/ /thar byed 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du dogs 'di g.yo rab tu g.yo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde/ ci mthong ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang / phyogs bzhin sa gas pa

mthong ngo / /sa gas pas sa gas pa'i phrag nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / 'og gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / steng gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung ba
mthong ngo / /de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis rnam par bltas nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dir su dag skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs 'di
dag ni| khyed la bde ba'i phyir skyes so/ /gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /de bzhin te/ sems can
thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ yang skye ba dang / 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ 'o na brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro'am/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas chos gang mnyan pa zhus te
yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la blta bar
bgyi ste| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu la spro'i/ skye ba dang / 'gum pa la ni/ blta bar mi spro'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi
stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu stan las langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo krung bcas nas
bsam gtan byed de/ de dag thams cad kyi lus las seng+ge rnams byung ngo / /stag rnams byung ngo / /sprul rnams byung ngo / /glang po rnams byung ngo / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul
pa ston te/ /ri la'ang skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /steng du dpag tshad nyi khri srid du yang 'gro'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong phrag bcu'ang 'bab par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu
gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed zla ba dang / nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong
lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi lus las 'od zer snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /

cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/ bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi
don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag 'dir mi'i lus dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bstan nas 'di 'dra ba'i stobs nye bar ston to/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde/ khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /des 'di snyam bsam ste/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu'o/ /snyam bsams pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs bar bya'o/ /bstan par
bya'o| |rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /sman gyi sde/ gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
the tshom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye
ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba dang / 'byung po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / yi dwags
dang sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can 'di dag ni/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i
gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag ni/ deng kho nar 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas deng nyid sa bcu
rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rga dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir/ /las byas bde ba thob byed cing / /
nyon mongs zhags pa pham byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba 'di ci'i
slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa/ /thar par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /
sems can gzhon nu mang po dag /de ring gzugs rnams 'thob par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir/ /chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /chos char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/ /de ltar sems can 'dus bas na/ /nga yi bstan la dga' ba'o/ /lha
dang klu dang yi dwags dang / /lha min shin tu mi bzad pas/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas te/ /chos kyi sgra yang sgrog par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnga yang brdung bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dung yang rab tu
'bud| |sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang / /brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhin/ /de dag deng ni chos 'thob 'gyur/ /de nas sems
can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba/ /'khor ba na ni 'chi ba ste/ /lus ni khur lti bcom ldan 'das/ /'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa/ /lam ni rnam par ma 'tshal te/ /lam nyid
kyang ni mi gda' bas/ /mgon po bdag cag ldongs gyur na/ /bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gsol/ /dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal/ /'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol/ /
bdag cag shes rab chung ngur skyes/ /bde ba mngon par ma 'tshal to/ /bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar mdzod/ /gang dang gang du skyes par
yang / /bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di
skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag rnams ni zas zo zhig /mang du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung / /'jigs pa med par gyur nas su/ /phyis 'dod 'jigs med chos nyon cig /smras pa/ btsun
pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig /bdag cag rnams kyis khyod mi shes/ /khyod ni rab tu mdzes par mthong / /gzugs ni zhi zhing grags pa che/ /yi dwags 'jig rten 'jigs chen dang / /
sems dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mdzes pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad zhi/ /khyod kyi lag na snod yod pa/ /rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang / /lus la
rin chen srad bu dang / /gzi brjid phung pos brgyan pa mthong / /zhi ba khyod kyis tshig smras pa/ /bdag cag lan 'debs mi nus so/ /bdag cag la ni zas rnams dang / /zhim po'i skom
yang mi dgos te/ /zas las bshad pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin skom yang gcin du 'gyur/ /khu ba rnams las khrag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas/ /zas
dang skom rab sbyar ba yang / /bdag cag rnams la dgos ma yin/ /dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang / /phra mo'i gos kyang dgos pa med/ /gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te/ /mu tig phreng
ba dgos ma yin/ /sor gdub dag kyang mi dgos te/ /de kun mi rtag chos can no/ /bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su/ /'gro bar mi 'gyur srog tshol lo/ /lha rnams kyi ni bde ba
dang / /chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal ma yin no/ /rab tu bzang ba'i gling por nas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba
'chi bar 'gyur/ /bu yang phya bzhin mi 'brang ste/ /chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min/ /rin chen sna bdun phyin lus/ /phyi bzhin 'brang ba ma yin no/ /skye bo mang po bsdus pa yang / /phyi
bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te/ /mdun du rgyug pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ltar phyin chad mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe gcig gis ni rgyal po las/ /mi rtag pas ni 'khyams
'gyur te/ /sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas/ /de dag sems dmyal du 'bod ltung / /rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu bskor ba las/ /gang tshe du
'bod smin pa'i tshe/ /rdzu 'brul de ni gang du song / /sa gang dag na yod min pa/ /shi nas rdzu 'phrul byed mi nus/ /gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson/ /gang na de bzhin
gshegs par bzhud/ /pha dang ma ni ji lta bar/ /de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod/ /bdag cag la ni ma yang med/ /pha med phu nu rnams kyang med/ /'jig rten gtso bo de bzhin
gshegs/ /de nyid pha dang ma yin no/ /de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste/ /bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o/ /gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar/ /de ni 'khor ba thar mdzad pa'o/ /nyon mongs bcu po
'jigs chen dang / /chu bo sgrol ba'i gru de 'o/ /de yis sems can rab bsgral te/ /phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go/ /byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa/ /dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do/ /
bdag cag rnams la zas mi dgos/ /rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de/ /sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten 'gro mi bya/ /mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste/ /de na thams
cad mkhyen par snang / /rang gi las ni nyes byas pas/ /tshe thung rnams ni 'khyams pa yin/ /de dag 'chi ba mi shes kyi/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes/ /skye dang 'gag pas bslus
pa rnams/ /shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med/ /mi rtag bas ni sems 'khrul rnams/ /phra ba'i chos rnams ma shes te/ /phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la/ /zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so/ /'chi
'pho la ni skyo med pa/ /yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rab gzir cing / /rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs byas nas/ /gzhan dag gi yang 'phrog byed de/ /de bzhin bcing
zhing bsad pas byas/ /sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas na/ /de dag bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur/ /mya ngan zug rdus zug par 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag
ba na| |snying rje bar ni sme sngags 'don/ /bdag gi skyob par su 'gyur la/ /gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang / /longs spyod thams cad bdag gis dbul/ /bdag ni bran du'ang 'gyur bar
bya| |bran gyi chul du gang gyur ba/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no/ /rang gi lus ni bdag mi dgos/ /sdig pa byed
pa mi 'grol te/ /de ltar gnas brtan bdag cag la/ /bza' ba dgos ba ma yin no/ /gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa/ /rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /btung ba mchog ni 'thungs pa yi/ /
lha'i bu rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cho ma cho dgu ro ldan pa/ /zas dang skom ni rab bshams te/ /rgyal po'i mdun du blangs nas su/ /kha zas la ni lces reg
nas| |rgyal po rnams ni ro la chags/ /sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed/ /gang la snying po med pa yi/ /mi rtag ro la chags par byed/ /bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos/ /
bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba/ /chos nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin/ /sred pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /sred pa'i nyon mongs rnam thar
te| |bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i/ /sangs rgyas de la skyabs su dong / /drang srong chen po 'jig mgon la/ /bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dod/ /sems can rnams kyis
mthong dka' la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dong / /khyod kyi mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyi/ /snyan pa'i mtshan ni bstan du gsol/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ khyed dang skye bo thams cad
dang / /de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod/ /sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag /stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskor/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod ni sangs rgyas nyan thos te/ /ming
ni zab par grags pa yin/ /skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du/ /khyod kyi ming ni thos par 'dod/ /smras pa/ nga yi ming ni sman gyi sde/ /nga ni sems can rnams kyi sman/ /sman rnams kun gyi
dam pa ni/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /nad kun gyis btab skye bo yi/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /'dod chags nad ni nad po che/ /'jig rten 'jig byed mi bzad pa/ /
gang gis blo med 'khyams pa yi/ /gti mug nad ni che zhing drag /sems dmyal de bzhin dud 'gro dang / /yi dwags rnams su sems can 'gro /byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin/ /de dag ji
ltar zhi bar 'gyur/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/ /byis pa blo ni mi shes pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol nas kyang / /
sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ /bdag cag chos kyi sbyin pa nyan/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spangs/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa/ /
sman pa'i rgyal po sman pa ste/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams gso byed pa/ /yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir/ /gnas brtan khyod ni myur du bzhud/ /
phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi chog /'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs/ /nad 'di rab tu zhi bar mdzod/ /lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te/ /tshig cing zhi ba med pa yi/ /mi bzad
me ni zhi bar mdzod/ /lus kyi khur ni khur po che/ /shin tu mi bzad rno ba'i khur/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba bdag cag la/ /brtul zhugs dam pa thugs rje mdzod/ /skye bo rtag tu zhes
sdang dang / /gti mug non pa'i khur khyer te/ /khur las thar ba mi shes pa/ /de dag yang dang yang khur khyar/ /thar pa'i lam ni mi shes shing / /thar pa'i lam ni
ma mthong rnams/ /'chi ba rnam par shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do/ /bdag cag la ni nam du yang / /'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas/ /kun tu 'khrul pas ma shi
ba| |mthong yang rnam par mi shes so/ /de dag pha yang mi dran te/ /nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing / /nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrugs na/ /ji ltar kha zas za bar 'gyur/ /sdug
bsngal nyam thag mi shes te/ /bdag cag ngal ba don med do/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /ma rig gzhi las skyes pa 'o/ /'du shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams/ /'jigs chen lci
ba'i khur yin no/ /gang chos rnam par mi shes pa/ /byis pa sred pas rab tu 'khyams/ /lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni/ /'jig rten du ni don med skyes/ /gos gtsang zhin tu bzang
ba dang / /khrus dang byug pa dgos pa 'o/ /lus la gang yin 'ong ba yin/ /kha zas zhim po dgos pa ste/ /yid 'ong ba yi sil snyan lnga/ /de bzhin rna bas tshor bar byed/ /rin chen bdun
las byung ba yi/ /gzugs la mig gis chags par byed/ /zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni/ /lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste/ /'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang / /lus kyis rtag tu
tshor bar byed/ /lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po/ /dga' bar yang ni bsgrubs pa las/ /sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes/ /de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed/ /de na bdag rkang dga' byed
pa| |lham ni rab tu bzang gyon yang / /'chi bar 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang / /byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te/ /lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min na/ /gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos/ /mi
zhes bya ba lus yin te/ /dbugs dang stobs chen rnyed par 'gyur/ /so sor rtog pa'i rna ba'i stobs/ /de ni lus la yon tan che/ /sngon chang rta dang glang po yis/ /kun tu bskor nas rtse
zhing 'khyams/ /thar pa'i chos ni ma ster bas/ /bdag ci sdig pa'i las la chags/ /'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas/ /rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug /bdag ni yang dang yang skyes te/ /shi
ba bdag la yang 'ongs so/ /yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong / /smre sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings/ /ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong / /pha rnams shi dang gnyen dag dang / /sring mo dang ni
bu dag dang / /chung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong / /mngon par 'du byed kun stong na/ /sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags/ /'dod pas zin pa'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis yid brtan rung
bar shes/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te/ /'chi ba la ni mngon dga' med/ /de phyir 'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis/ /bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no/ /de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med//
de ni da dung mi ldog go /kun tu nor bas bdag cag skyes/ /'gro ba mtha' dag kun tu nor/ /kun tu nor ba'i sgra yang nyan/ /dam chos ma yin yongs su
'dzin| |thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal/ /lus ni kun tu bkur mi bya/ /'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas ston pa rnams su shog /sangs rgyas 'jig rten pha
dang ma| |sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /dzam+bu'i gling ni kun tu yang / /rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /chos kyi bsdu ba ci 'dra ba/ /sems can blun pos mi shes te/ /byang
chub tu ni sems bsngos na/ /chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad stong pa ste/ /de bzhin longs spyod nor yang stong / /bdag kyang stong par mthong bas na/ /mthong
nas re ba med par gyur/ /gnas brtan sman gyi sde khyod kyis/ /bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir/ /khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo/
'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka' thub che/ /yon tan kun tu sdud par byed/ /ston de dag la bzhugs par bzhud//
ston pa bde bar rab sad nas/ /rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar/ /bdag cag slad du zhu ba mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang / /stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas/ /sems can
thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi/ /chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyi/ /bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /gnas brtan
myur du bzhud du gsol/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba/ /de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes/ /thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas/ /sman gyi
sdes smras pa/ khyed cag de ltar ci zhig mthong / /re zhig gyen du blta bar byos/ /de dag gyen du bltas pa dang / /khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang / /lnga brgya tham par tshang ba zhig /
kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur/ /rin chen bdun gyis shin tu spras/ /rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan/ /dbus na me tog rab tu rgyas/ /lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu bab/ /de na gnas
brtan dris pa ni/ /khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang / /pad+ma ze bar kun gnas par/ /'di na snang ba 'di ci zhig /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ gnas 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste/ /sangs rgyas blta
ba'i phyir dengs shing / 'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa/ /'jig rten snang byed de la thud/ /de dag gis smras pa/ de yi lam yang ma 'tshal te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong
na| |gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas/ /phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du/ /reg par rung ba ma yin pas/ /bdud rtsi rab sbyin
ston pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni 'gro mi nus/ /ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar/ /ston pa de yang gnas na bzhugs/ /ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin/ /rgya mtsho
chen po gting tshod zin/ /stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba shes ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad la
'dud| |smras pa/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs/ /bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag cag sems kyis ston pa la/ /phyag bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob//
sman gyi sdes smras pa/ ston pa dril mi chags te/ /phreng ba ma yin byug pa min/ /gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyur ba/ /sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to/ /gang gis yid ni
btul byas shing / /sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba/ /de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog /'thab mo rgol bar mi byed do/ /'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi/ /gzungs ni myur du rnyed
par 'gyur/ /de sems rab tu dang byas nas/ /de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum
pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis thams cad dang
ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/ sems can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/ lha'i gnas
sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar gyur/ 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel
dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde
bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad
pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
gal te bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi
sde| khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gzhon nu
bye ba stong phrag sum cu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po khyed rnams ni/ chos mi
shes pa'o/ /rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba la chags pa'o/ /zhes phra mo rnams mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su brjod la gnod pa bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de dag ci'i phyir tshig 'di skad smra ba mi shes sam/ de dag
ni| de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam zhing shin tu snyan pa smras ste/ chos kyang thos pas sman gyi sde/ de'i phyir de dag chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur/ yon
tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ de dag thams cad gzungs rtogs par 'gyur/ deng phyin chad sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur/ deng chos kyi rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin par
'gyur| deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde
bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du
zhugs nas chos mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /deng nyid dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te /
lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can log par ltung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos nas 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rgan po bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de
dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ de dag thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ de dag thams cad ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ de dag thams cad ni/ chos chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ phyogs bzhir ltos shig /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /

lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag bdun cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / byang phyogs
nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / 'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / steng gi phyogs
nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'ong ste/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs
dmar po gda' ba ci zhig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin mi shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas
ni| mkhyen te/ sman gyi sde/ 'di ni/ bdud yin no/ /sman gyi sde/ mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa 'di lta bu lhags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/ de sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi
chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'di lhags pa dag mthong
ngam| gsol pa/ bdag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed
cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/ gzugs sna tshogs/ kha dog sna tshogs/ dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la
gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la gnas pa mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsar rnying de dag kun dang / thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes
sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA tsin+t+ya pra b+hA sa ni ra de sho nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/ rgyal po
dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / nang mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / byogs pa dang / myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ gdung phun sum tshogs pa/ cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun
sum tshogs pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /zhes/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi grags pa'i sgra dang / snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha
dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ /tshig 'bru bzang
po| |ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyan lnga dang yang ldan te/ sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang /
shes rab kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu ba
gnyen gyi bu rnams ni/ tshar bcad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe
chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mdun du gzigs pa dang / g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang / bskum pa dang brkyang pa mdzes pa dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang /
bsil zan dang / na bza'i tshogs dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang / sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'od 'dom gang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi

nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang / tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta ba dang / nyi ma shar ba lta bur phyogs su snang zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te/ grong khyer chen
po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyin gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs
pa na| cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/ der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par
bya'i| shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon cig /long pa rnams kyis ni/ mthong ngo / /'on pa rnams kyis ni/ thos so/ /gcer bu rnams kyis ni/ gos rnyed do/ /smyon pa rnams kyis dran pa

thob po| |grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni/ thal mo sbyar te/ bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / sgra snyan dag ni/ ma brdungs par sgra 'byung
ngo / /ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / khu byug dag kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to/ /gang dag gter stor ba de dag gis ni/ gter rnams rnyed par
gyur to| |gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /sa'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'gul te/ sems can rnams skyabs med par yang ma gyur cing /
yid dang ba rab tu thob bo/ /smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad+ma dri ma med cing / legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo / /dud
'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba
med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug ba dag btsas so/ /sems can rnams la'ang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis
gnod par gyur pa med do/ /rab tu sdang ba'i sems med par phan tshun smra ste/ dper na/ pha'am ma zhig bu gcig pa la smra ba bzhin no/ /srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang
legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor to/ /sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur
pa gang yang med do/ /sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par gyur te/ bde ba thob bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de
bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bdag kho na la gzigs so/ /snyam du sems so/ /so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing / mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod
snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /snyam du sems te/ de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar
chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus shig tu gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe khang stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig por bar gyur te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas 'jig cing 'dug pa la khyi'am/ ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa
de dag kyang khye'u de la lce'i dbang pos bldags shing 'dong ste/ 'di ltar sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do/ /khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug
cing 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang du
skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong de na ci yod ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ khang stong
ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug ste/ 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzum
par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ khang stong de na khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/ mig mi 'dzum par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad
la lta ba zhig mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legs par bshad pa'i don shes
par nus shing / skal ba can no/ /snyam nas khye'u de la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzud pa'i phyir khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das der gshegs nas phyogs gcig tu bzhugs te phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sprul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yis/ /dur khrod
'jigs pa che 'di na/ /byis pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing / /khyod da gcig pu 'di na 'dug /de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das
la slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'jigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog /ji ltar 'dir mchis las
gang lags/ /bdag gcig bdag gis gang ma mchis/ /bdag kyang gang gi'ang ma lags te/ /bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong / /bdag gi su lags de ma mthong / /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon chad sdig pa byas pa'i las/ /de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ /khang ba stong pa 'dir por nas/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ gau tam
khang stong snyam pa yi/ /'du shes da dung mnga' ba blta/ /byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas/ /'du shes yongs su ma mkhyen tam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni
'du shes yongs shes te/ /nga la 'du shes yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid la ni snying brtse bas/ /khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ongs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can dag ni bar 'ga' yang / /
gang tshe shin tu mi dmigs pa/ /de tshe thugs rje gang du byung / /khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med zhi ba stong pa nyid/ /sems can 'di
dag mi shes te/ /de dag nyid la snying brtse phyir/ /bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ stong pa zhi ba thugs chud nas/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang / /de bzhin gshegs
pa da dung du/ /phyin ci log kyang ma spangs sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas/ /sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /'dren pa chos ston mdzad
pa 'di| |sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/ /khyod kyis phyin ci log ma spangs/ /sems can 'du shes ma mchis na/ /thugs rje
gang du skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas/ /yod min sems can rnams la yang / /mi mchog rnams ni go gyon pa/ /rang
byung rnams kyis byin brlabs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ dngos po gang na mi dmigs pas/ /go cha thams cad rdzun pa lags/ /dngos po ma mchis chos rnams
la| |go cha dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams dngos po yod min yang / /srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di/ /'jig rten mgon po
skyob rnams kyi/ /thugs rjes rnam par rol pa yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ chos ni yi ge ma mchis na/ /bshad pa gud na ga la mchis/ /'jig rten rnams la slu mdzad dam/ /chos ma
lags pa chos bshad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni 'jig rten slu ma yin/ /chos ma yin pa nga mi smra/ /phyin ci log gyur sems can gyi/ /nyon mongs sel
bar nga byed do/ /khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te/ /nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang / /de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis/ /nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par sbyang / /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyin ci log las byung ba rnams/ /yongs su brtags las skyes pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston
to| |khye'us gsol pa/ rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshal te/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/ /nam yang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /sems ni rtag tu 'od gsal kyang / /glo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis/ /so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur/ /khye'us gsol pa/
nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis te/ /de dag phyogs na mi gnas na/ /glo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper
na sprin rnams par snang la/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra ste/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /khye'us gsol pa/ ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa/ /
chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do/ /ma nor de bzhin nyid chos la/ /nor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyi/ /
log par rnam par gang brtags pa/ /blo de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba/ /rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas gang zhig byung / /skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'thad ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med par skye ba ni/ /sangs rgyas
'byung ba rab tu bstan/ /kun rdzob tha snyad btags pa ste/ /dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ da dung khyod la don dam dang / /kun rdzob 'du shes gnyis mnga' ste/ /theg
pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba/ /gau tam khyod kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed/ /'gal
ba med par nga gnas te/ /mi mthun sems can sdums kyang byed/ /khye'u khyod de ltar shes par gyis/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can de ni mi dmigs na/ /gau ta ma khyod ci
sdums mdzad/ /chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs/ /gang gis kun nas nyon mongs skye/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / /
de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang / /byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /khye'us gsol pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes sgrog mdzad cing / /nyid kyi
mkhyen pa sgrog mdzad de/ /'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas/ /khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bdag la mi bstod de/ /de bzhin gzhan
la brnyas mi byed/ /de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston/ /des na de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/ /khye'us gsol pa/ brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid/ /de na de nyid ma mchis na/ /sgra skad ma
mchis sgra bshad pa/ /mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos de thams cad log pa ste/ /de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin
nyid ni rtogs pas na/ /nga la skyon med yon tan med/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yis na/ /bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te/ /'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa/ /rdzogs
sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/ khye'u de logs su brkyang ba dang / de nas khye'u des
bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sor mo la bzung ste langs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/ srang du bzhag pa dang / de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u
'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to/ /snyam nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/
bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u/ khyod kyi las kyi sgrib pa zad kyi/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran
par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen po la'ang shes par bgyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig /de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas lus las 'od phyung ste/
'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang / dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to/ /'od des brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lha brgya
stong mang po gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bskul bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ snang ba
bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyis snang bar bgyis nas/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyis so/ /zhes ched du brjod pa de skad
ched du brjod de/ de ltar khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khye'u 'di snang ba bsam
gyis mi khyab pa bya bar gyur cig /ces khye'u de'i ming la rjes su yi rang mdzad do/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bar snang de las babs te/ sa la 'dug pa dang / de sangs
rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ grogs po lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongs su grub par gyur pa de 'dra bar 'dug go /de nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung zhig byin te/ kye khye'u/ nga la snying brtse ba'i phyir ras bcos bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 'dug cig /de nas khye'u
snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ gos kyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni/ chos kyi rgyan thogs na mdzes so/ /kau shi ka /de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag
nyon cig /byang chub kyi sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i rgyan ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sems can thams cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brtan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sgyu dang g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/
dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ thams cad las khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
nga rgyal med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/
chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang
des pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang / sgra skad lta bu'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brtan zhing sems mi zhum pa ni/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
'jug pa thob pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa'i shes
rab ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bag la nyal dang / lta bar smra ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po ni/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing med par chos ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab kyis
bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /chos sgrub pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs
'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rgyan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa de nam yang gcer pu ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la
shin tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ras bcos bu'i zung 'di len
du stsal bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u/ ras bcos bu'i zung 'di longs la gyon cig /
de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos bu'i zung blangs nas bgos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod
snyoms la gshegs so/ /de na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tshong dpon dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag ngo
mtshar du gyur te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la'ang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das mthar gyis bsod snyoms bzhes te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma'i khyim gal ba der gshegs so/ /gshegs nas kyang cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig
tu bzhugs so/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma ngo tsha nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir sgor ma byung ngo / /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang gi
khyim du song nas/ ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sngon gyi nongs pa yis/ /khyod kyi mngal du bdag mchis te/ /yum gyis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ /'o ltar gnod bar
ma mdzad cig /thugs brtse ldan te bskyed pas na/ /bdag gi sbyin gnas khyod lags so/ /zhal tsha ma mdzad ma 'dzem par/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bzhud/ /de ltar khyod
mngal bdag mchis pa/ /khyod kyis brnyes pa legs par brnyes/ /lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyang / /rnam par 'dren la zhu ba mdzod/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas
lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig /de dag bdag gis skyed pa'i ma
'di la stsol to/ /'dis de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag byin no/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
yum gcig lha yi me tog man+dA ra/ /blta sdug bsngal shing yid du 'ong ba dag /spos dang na bza' 'di dag blang mdzod la/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas de la dbul ba mdzod/ /'jig rten dag na
pha ma zas skom dang / /nor dang gos kyis mchod pa mchod ma lags so/ /gzhan du gang dag chos la sbyor bgyid pa/ /des na de dag mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dam pa de la
mchod mdzod la/ /byang chub mchog tu smon lam brtan par mdzod/ /bdag ni dus dus khyod kyi drung mchis te/ /yun ring dus nas skul ba bgyid pa lags/ /gnod zhing zhum pa'i sems su
ma mdzad par/ /rangs pa'i sems dang dga' ba thob mdzod la/ /rang byung rgyal ba bzhugs pa der bzhud de/ /skyes bu mchog gi zhabs la phyag mdzod la/ /mgon po
de la me tog spos rnams dang / /de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su/ /rgyal ba de las dge ba'i rtsa bskyed de/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa mdzod/ /byang chub mchog
tu sems ni brtan gyur nas/ /gang dag dang bas rgyal la gus bgyis pa/ /de dag rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsal ces/ /rang byung rgyal ba de la zhu ba mdzod/ /de nas bud med de
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhu ba ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
gus pa dang bcas par yongs su zhus so/ /zhu ba zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa 'dis/ /ngan 'gro'am mi khom 'gro mi 'gyur//
sangs rgyas bya mang mnyes byas nas/ /mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ khye'u snang ba
bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag dang yang thabs cig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba
der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos mnyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /de nas yul ko sa la'i
rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ga la mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas mthong ste/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa lha las 'das pa'i mdog dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis brgyan pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar 'di'i lus yongs
su dag par gyur snyam mo/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa
sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag rtag tu byams sems dag sems ldan/ /gang dag mi brlang mnyen zhing dran ldan la/ /legs par
bsdams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag sdig pa spong zhing mi spyod la/ /rtag tu dge ba mi chung rnam spel zhing / /gnod par sems dang khro
ba rnam spong ba/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /gus dang bcas par rtag tu mchod byed cing / /gzhan la rdeg 'tshog sdigs
mo mi byed pa/ /de dag lus rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag gzhan la phrag dog ser sna dang / /de bzhin nga rgyal dag kyang mi byed la/ /gzhan gyi nyes pa byung ba mi brjod pa/ /de
dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gzhan la co 'dri ba dang smad pa dang / /bshung ba dag ni nam yang mi byed cing / /gzhan la 'khrul ba'i glags lta mi byed pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam
par dag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di chos chen po dang
ldan pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/ khye'u 'di bud med khyim thab ma mchis pa'i mngal du skyes la/ der yang khang stong du bor bar gyur/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i
gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/ lha bzang zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi
ldog par gyur cing / don nyung ba/ bya ba nyung ba/ dben pa la dga' ba/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar
gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ lha bzang gi g.yog byed do/ /de ha cang grong dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug ste/
zhugs nas kyang bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang des de la khyod ci'i phyir rnal 'byor dang spong ba la brtson par mi byed par ha cang bya ba mang zhing
ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhing bstan to/ /des de la yang dang yang bskul bas khros 'khrugs te yid ma rangs nas/ gnod sems su gyur pa des lus dang
sems ma rungs par byas te/ ngan du bsam nas tshig rtsub po smras pa/ nal gyi bu/ sbyar ma'i bu/ skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi pha ma'ang med na/ khyod la shes rab bam/ tshul
khrims lta ga la yod ces des ngan du bsam ste/ tshig rtsub po smras pa/ mi mthol/ mi 'chags/ mi 'dor gyi/ zhe la 'dzin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag
tu ngan sems dang ldan zhing byams pa'i sems med par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gis kyang de snod ma yin no/ /zhes nas bkye ba dang / de de bas kyang byang chub
sems dpa' lha bzang la ngan du sems shing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod de/ snyan pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod do/ /de
las bsags shing tshogs su byas pa des lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu bud med khyim zab med pa'i mngal du skyes so/ /byang chub kyi sems bsrungs pas des na sems
can dmyal bar ni/ ma skyes so/ /de btsal ma thag tu bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/ der de khyi dang / spyang ki dang / ce sbyang rnams kyis zos so/ /rgyal po chen po/
tshul 'di 'dra bar 'di bskal pa dgu bcur sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang / nyam thag pa 'di lta bus 'chi ba'i dus byas shing btsas pa na'ang bor bar gyur te/ yang skye bo phal po che 'di
skad du nal gyi bu/ sbyar ma'i bu 'di la khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / ce sbyang rnams za'o/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa zhe bya bar gyur pa de
gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di
de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po /'di'i las kyi sgrib pa ni/ zad/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems ni/ rnam par sbyangs/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ni/ mnyes par byas/ ngan 'gro thams cad ni/ bcad nas/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mnyes par byas shing / bsti
stang byas| ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /chos yongs su btsal ba la'ang brtson par gyur to/ /rgyal po
chen po| de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid chen po 'di thob bo/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ las nag po dang / dkar po dag chud za bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rgyal po
chen po| de lta bas na/ mkhas pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las bsdam par bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi bya'o/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyas gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyi bar gyur
pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob lags sam/ 'on te da dung du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs
par spyad pa spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal 'byung zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das| rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos gus par bgyis te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi'o/ /bsten par bgyi'o/ /bsnyen
bkur bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ dge ba'i chos 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
dge ba'i chos thob pas bsam pa dge bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa dge bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba dge bas dge ba'i las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /las dge bas 'gro ba dge
par mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba dge bas dge ba'i grogs po mgu bar bgyid do/ /grogs po dge bas sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa ma bgyis shing dge
ba'i las bgyis pas bdag la gdung bar mi 'gyur/ gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrungs pas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
byang chub kyi lam la gnas pas lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bgyid nus pa dang / skal ba mchis pa dang / mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod
pa thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la 'jug pa dang /
chad pa dang rtag pa rnam par spong ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos shing / stong pa nyid spyod yul ba ste/ byang
chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang
bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'pho ba dang / da ltar byung ba 'jig par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag
go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / las dben pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi /gzugs su ma yin pa dang / chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi /yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang / dge 'dun la 'dus ma
byas su mthong gi /tshogs su ma yin pa dang / shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong
bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can med par rnam par dpyod pa dang / snying rje chen po ste/ khye'u/ byang chub sems
dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod par 'gyur
ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang / mchog tu
dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ kha dog du ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
med pa snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/ blta sdug bltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang /
dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes shing / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kyis 'od mdzad pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshul khrims 'phags shing spyod
pa legs spyad pa/ /ting 'dzin shes rab bsags pa'i ye shes 'od/ /rnam grol snying po stobs ldan yang dag gzigs/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bzod
pa'i stobs ldan stobs kyi shugs mnga' ba/ /brtson 'grus mngon par 'phags te mi bskyod pa/ /mig tu sdug cing bden pa bzhi gzigs pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la
bstan du gsol/ /rdo rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa/ /sred med bu mthu sred med bu bas mchog /tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan 'jam pa'i dbyangs ldan pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan
du gsol/ /bzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lha tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ma mthong / /gus dang bcas pas kun nas lta bgyid pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la
bstan du gsol/ /khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor/ /mi rtag sgras ni lha dang lha min dang / /de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin rab bskyod pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//
snang ba brnyes shing mun pa rnam bral ba/ /kun nas spyan mnga' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa/ /yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po bstan/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal do/ /kun dga' bo/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shing ta la bdun srid
kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i 'og tu bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyong zhes bya bar de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun
dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba de ni/ 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su
spyod pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sum khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya zhing / bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya
bar 'gyur zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ /bar gyi bskal pa brgya stong mang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngon nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba
bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba de na/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'di skad du bskal pa 'di ni/ kun tu snang ba med pa/ kun tu snang ba med pa ste/ de la de
bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo / /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang /
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' drug cu ni/ mi skye
ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /nyan thos lnga brgya ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs
'di zungs shig /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya
bar zungs shig /kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas zhugs pa la bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog gi
phur ma ri rab tsam gtor ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lha dang mi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po
gzhan dag gis mchod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing klog la/ kun chub par byed
cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston la/ de bzhin du nan tan du byed na/ 'di ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa chos kyi mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par
bya| gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi

lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nA ma bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Nok+ta d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das yul mnyam dka' na chos kyi dgon pa byang chub kyi snying po na nor bu rdo rjes spras pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sangs
rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs cig go /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'jig rten
gyi khams mi mjed kyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi nyin zhag
gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
snying pos rab tu 'dul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams dur smrig gi rgyal
mtshan gyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za bar pad+mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog
pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi bskal
pa de ni| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten
gyi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i nyin
zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa thams cad blo gros
'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi bskal pa de ni/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang
'jig rten gyi khams brtag cing bgrang ba la 'jug pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su spyod
pa'i khyad par can 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'chi
ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rab 'byams dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dga' zhing de skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos smras pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye

shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya maN+Dal aSh+Ta d+har+m+ma par+ya ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge
'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor
der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das na/ gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan
'das| bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis thos na'ang dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
kyi bu| nyon cig dang / dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so so'i skye bo'i dus na kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang
du byas pa de bstan par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi
khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin tu ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i
chos lnga dang ldan zhing / chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so/ /dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi
'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o/ /re zhig na dus kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i sems su gyur nas/ re zhig na khyim bdag des
legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so/ /de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir
dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te/ khyim
bdag /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang
du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ 'khor mang po dang lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur/ yo byad phun
sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/ lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de la ri dang
rtsig pa rnams kyang sgrib par mi byed de/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la yi rang bar gyur nas/ dge slong de'i rkang pa
la phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa ston cig dang / des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong
rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/ /des na lci ba gsar bsres pa'i/ /
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sems can kun dang thun mong du/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung / /byang chub sems
dpa' nyan thos dang / /rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa/ /de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor yug dgu /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams
bya ste| |'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang / /thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang / /kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang / /gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang / /'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa dang / /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang / /de bzhin sa yi snying po ste/ /de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o/ /khyim bdag /'di ni/ dkyil
'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ 'di ni/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon
sum du thos so/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig /kun nas skal pa mthun pa yi/ /'khor rnams gang zhig 'dod pa des/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad ni 'dri bar bya/ /gang
zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang / /lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang / /blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzang 'dod/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor
mchog brgyad bya/ /seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de ltar mi blta
ste| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag
shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis za na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya
ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to/ /ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang / sangs rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos
'di kun tu bsten to/ /bsgoms so/ /mang du byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis na/ nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur ba'i rgyu ni/ de yin no/ /rkyen ni/ de yin no/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha
ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
